results.title: Report a missed bin collection | Sandwell Council
results.snippet: If you are reporting a missed bin, you must fill in the form within two working days of your collection being missed.

results.title: What do I do if my bin hasn't been emptied? | Sandwell Council
results.snippet: If your bin has not been collected on your normal collection day, you can report it online within two days of it being missed.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.answer_quality: The content does answer this question as there is a clear call-to-action button that allows the resident to report a missed bin collection.
Reason.reasoning: The webpage provides a direct link and button to report a missed bin collection which indicates that the content does address the need effectively.
Reason.next_actions: I would click on the 'Report a missed bin collection' button to start the process of reporting my missed bin collection.

Reason.need: Understand steps to take if I forgot to put my bin out.
Reason.answer_quality: The content does provide some guidance on what to do if the bin was not collected, such as keeping extra waste and placing it in the bin once it has been emptied.
Reason.reasoning: Although the focus of the content is primarily about reporting a missed collection, there is some guidance on what to do when a collection is missed, showing that the content does partially address the need.
Reason.next_actions: If my bin was not collected, I would keep any excess waste until it can be emptied.

Reason.need: Understand who to contact for help with a missed bin collection.
Reason.answer_quality: The content does provide the contact information (a link to report a missed bin collection) necessary for residents to seek assistance if their bin was not collected.
Reason.reasoning: There is a 'Report a missed bin collection' button that links directly to a form where residents can input their details and request assistance with a missed bin collection, indicating the content does address this need effectively.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content provides clear guidance on how to report a missed bin collection and offers some advice on what to do when a collection is missed. However, it does not explicitly mention the expected time for a missed bin collection to be picked up or any detailed information regarding multiple bins being missed or more complex scenarios. Thus, while the content addresses the main needs of a council resident, there are key gaps or areas for improvement.
